member.name: T:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.CompositeSinkPad
member.summary: A SinkPad that Consists of multiple Childpads.
member.remarks: This Pad is used to support more than one InputType / Format. To do so add pads for all supportrd InputTypes / Formats indo the ChildPads list. The Childpads chould be ordered from least taxing conversion to most taxing conversion since the Pads will be tried during linking in the order of the list.

member.name: M:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.CompositeSinkPad.#ctor(CStreamer.Base.BaseElements.IElement,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{CStreamer.Base.BaseElements.ISinkPad},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: the element this pad is connected to.
the name of the pad.
A list of acceptable Childpads.
A value indicating whether the Pad needs to be linked for the element to be functional.

member.name: P:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.CompositeSinkPad.ChildPads
member.summary: Gets the child pads.

member.name: T:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.Element
member.summary: Baseclass for all element.

member.name: M:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.Element.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: the name ot the element.

member.name: M:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.Element.TransitionStoppedReady
member.summary:
Contains the logic that should run when changing from the Stopped to the Ready state.
Usually initalization if external resources.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous state change.

member.name: M:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.Element.TransitionReadyPlaying
member.summary:
Contains the logic that should run when changing from the Ready to the Playing state.
Usually preparing to receive data.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous state change.

member.name: M:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.Element.TransitionPlayingReady
member.summary:
Contains the logic that should run when changing from the Playing to the Ready state.
Usually stopping data processing.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous state change.

member.name: M:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.Element.TransitionReadyStopped
member.summary:
Contains the logic that should run when changing from the Ready to the Stopped state.
Usually freeing of external resources.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous state change.

member.name: T:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.PluginAssemblyAttribute
member.summary: Marks an assembly as a plugin to reduce unneccesary loading of non plugin libraries on startup.

member.name: T:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.PluginCatalog
member.summary:
Loads all the assemblies marked with the .
It looks for assemblies in:
The current path (".")
The plugin directory if it exists ("./plugins")(
A directory accoring to the "CSTREAMER_PLUGIN_DIR" environment variable if it exists.

member.name: M:CStreamer.Plugins.Base.PluginCatalog.PluginTypes
member.summary: Returns a list of all exposed types inside the plugin assemblies.
member.returns: A list of all exposed types inside the plugin assemblies.
